items.sentence: Tom went out for a walk as he always does in the afternoon.
I hear the service there is good and the food is delicious.
Tom always looks in the rearview mirror before he backs up.
Tom and I had a very interesting conversation this morning.
Do we have enough time to finish this before Tom gets here?
Do you have any idea what the minimum wage in Australia is?
How much time does the average teenager watch TV every day?
I never thought he was capable of doing something so cruel.
There\'s a chance that Tom might try to kill himself again.
There\'s a very good chance that Tom will be here tomorrow.
